Text: CE World Call for NRONCOM Invited CE World authors Many of you have heard by now that ASCE is hosting the st Virtual World Congress for Civil Engineering CE World wwwceworldorg The callforcontent was issued earlier this summer and the deadline for submission was September Although this deadline has passed we are still accepting contributions Go to Submit Abstracts on the CE World web site As Content Area Manager for the GeoTechnology area I invite you to visit their website to find out more and to submit a contribution Most content is expected to be in the form of papers although you are challenged to think outside the box by including other forms of media Remember this is a virtual conferenceyou do not need to attend you visit the Congress from the web This is a good opportunity to show case your work without having to travel to present it If you are interested in obtaining additional information on CE World you can contact me at or Alternatively you can contact CE World Content Manager Walter Marlowe at or I hope you will consider this invitation Kindest Regards John John P Tinucci PE PhD Pres Phone PanTechnica Corporation Fax Victoria Drive Email Eden Prairie MN USA NRONCOM
